snippet: The Institute for Supply Management said its index of national factory activity fell to 58.7 last month as the pace of restocking slowed.
abstract: Institute for Supply Management says its index of national factory activity fell to 58.7 in November as pace of restocking slowed.
lead_paragraph: The Institute for Supply Management said its index of national factory activity fell to 58.7 last month as the pace of restocking slowed.

headline.main: Factory Activity Moderates, but Economy Remains Steady
headline.print_headline: Factory Activity Moderates, but Economy Remains Steady
